name: Don't Look Back - VR
description: Your goal is to find 6 hearts within an underground maze. This is a remastered version of the original DK1 game released in 2014. Armed with only a torch, how quickly can you find the 6 hearts to escape the maze? And will you resist the urge to look back.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 Storage: 1 GB available space
